name: Zapier Goal Automation
description: Trigger Zapier workflows when goals are reached

automation_ideas.description: Email yourself when you complete goals
Track goal completions in a spreadsheet
Share your achievements on social media
Mark related tasks as complete in Todoist/Asana

setup_instructions: 1. Create a free Zapier account at zapier.com
2. Create a new Zap with 'Webhooks by Zapier' trigger
3. Choose 'Catch Hook' as the trigger event
4. Copy the webhook URL from Zapier
5. Replace the URL in this configuration
6. Add the webhook: sr webhook add --name "Zapier Goal Triggers" --url "YOUR_ZAPIER_URL" --event "goal_reached"
7. Test the webhook: sr webhook test <webhook-id>
8. Complete your Zap by adding an action (email, sheets, etc.)
